text: That name is fine. I'll just ask about all the other package <https://github.com/JuliaRegistries/General/pulls?q=is%3Apr+kwatme+> which have some *very* generic names and some contain zero code (e.g. <https://github.com/KwatME/Clean.jl/blob/a174a92fc815d6c37810fb9abbdf5b2396ee1b8f/src/Clean.jl>) and some seems just like personal utility that is of little use to others (e.g. <https://github.com/KwatME/Support.jl>).

text: I don't see anything in those packages that is useful to anybody except the author at this point. Why the hurry to register them? Do we have any policy about registering empty packages?

text: I believe we haven't in the past.

text: I thought there was a rule that you needed CI, and assumed that meant `@test true` wouldn’t cut it, but not sure how formal that is or was.
